title: Project Ava: Fixing UI and App dev
excerpt: Converting the ngrok Ava website into an APK and refining the UI for mobile use.
author: Codem
content:
Project Overview

Using my custom Android template for app development in Android Studio, I have successfully converted the ngrok Ava website into a functional APK.

UI Improvements and Fixes

I identified and fixed a layout issue where the send button was off-centered. Additionally, I adjusted the website styling to ensure better fitting and responsiveness within the app environment.

To professionalize the project, I have now assigned dedicated icons to both the website and the mobile app.

Future Roadmap

For the next phase, I am looking into implementing push notifications directly via the APK to replace the current Termux-based system.

You can check out my portfolio to see more of my recent work.
